en:
Before I inherited this inn from my father,
Hickory...

I had a lotta trouble speakin' with
customers when I was helpin' him out around
the Inn.

Learnin' to speak politely and without accent
to new customers was difficult...
but I got the hang of it after some time!

It's refreshin' to not have to worry about
that around you guys, though.

Might even give ya a bargain if ya decide to
rent a room now...
